channel.title: Fundraising on Xiaoyun Yang
channel.description: Recent content in Fundraising on Xiaoyun Yang

item.title: Getting Started With Startup Seed Funding
item.author: xiaoyun@looseleafapp.com (Xiaoyun Yang)
item.description: This documents my journey applying to the National Science Foundation (NSF) Seed Fund for my startup, LooseLeaf.

item.title: Getting Started With The SAM Application
item.author: xiaoyun@looseleafapp.com (Xiaoyun Yang)
item.description: The System for Award Management (SAM) is the primary registrant database for entities to do business with the U.S. Government. You must register with SAM before applying for a seed fund from the government for your startup.
